body:
So yeah, my problem is that after a while of jitterclicking or blockhitting really fast, my hand gets tired, that's bad because I am a decent clicker (8-10 on my best moments); but then my hand starts to hurt and I slow down to 6-7, Did that hapen to you before?
btw I take really long breaks, so it's not overplaying

title: Clicking Help

replies.body: I right click faster than I left click, I blame the bowspam ._.
replies.body_tagged: I right click faster than I left click, I blame the bowspam ._.

replies.body:
I don't do 30 clicks per second in minecraft anymore, why?
It hurts my so much, and then there is no use clicking 30 times, because minecraft can register clicks that fast, the maximum it could register is 6-7 times per second
replies.body_tagged:
I don't do 30 clicks per second in minecraft anymore, why?
It hurts my so much, and then there is no use clicking 30 times, because minecraft can register clicks that fast, the maximum it could register is 6-7 times per second

replies.body: I have a comfortable gaming mouse, so my hands are always in a comfortable position when I play, and don't usually get tired.
replies.body_tagged: I have a comfortable gaming mouse, so my hands are always in a comfortable position when I play, and don't usually get tired.

replies.body: I have a really bad mouse that conly only register 4 cps on a gaming mouse I can get a consistent 11 for about 20 mins then my hands hurt and I go down to 8-9
replies.body_tagged: I have a really bad mouse that conly only register 4 cps on a gaming mouse I can get a consistent 11 for about 20 mins then my hands hurt and I go down to 8-9

replies.body: I think that the maximun to register is 20 (mouse with macros can do it)
replies.body_tagged: I think that the maximun to register is 20 (mouse with macros can do it)

replies.body: Its basically about aiming, not hitting. :/
replies.body_tagged: Its basically about aiming, not hitting. :/

replies.body:
you could practice rapidly-clicking your mouse before bed, and when your tired, go to sleep, do it again tomorrow, and so on.. after a few weeks.. you'll be an unstoppable clicker :D
and yah, keep a mind out for the maximum, I don't know what it is.. but don't exceed it too much... or it'll be WAY to tiring xP

good aim - slow click = nothing
when you strafe if you have a confortable position you can just spamclick and deal a lot of damage
